name: Raging Redhead
description:
Raging Redhead is a basic 2D platformer with an emphasis on testing your skills and also your sanity. The game tends to hone a players' wall jumping skills and will push you to the limit if you take the hard route. Players also have the option to choose the easy route which lets them feel the sense of accomplishment of completing our short game.

This was just a small project made by two dudes trying to figure out how Unity3D works. The whole project was just made to learn programming, design and basic 2D sprite animation.
